Title: Enacts the "small cannabis farmer relief act"
Summary: Enacts the "small cannabis farmer relief act" in relation to authorizing certain licensees who qualify as distressed farmer licensees and who legally cultivated cannabis during the two thousand twenty-two or two thousand twenty-three calendar year to expand their cultivation canopy.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to enacting the "small cannabis farmer relief act"; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
